hero.title: Myanmar Explorer
hero.subtitle: Plan meaningful journeys across Myanmar's historic cities, sacred pagodas, colonial avenues, vibrant markets and cultural landscapes. We help you explore rich heritage while finding the shortest smart routes between landmarks.

timeline.title: Myanmar Historical Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Explore key periods that shaped Myanmar's cultural and political landscape. Expand any era for a concise contextual description.

footer.title: Myanmar Travel Explorer
footer.tagline: Plan smarter journeys across Myanmar with history, highlights, and intelligent routing.
